content.title: Interaction Detection with Bayesian Decision Tree Ensembles
content.abstract: Methods based on Bayesian decision tree ensembles have proven valuable in constructing high-quality predictions, and are particularly attractive in certain settings because they encourage low-order...

content.title: Incorporating Grouping Information into Bayesian Decision Tree Ensembles
content.abstract: We consider the problem of nonparametric regression in the high-dimensional setting in which $P \gg N$. We study the use of overlapping group structures to improve prediction and variable selection...
